text:
Thanks to her marriage to David Eason, Jenelle Evans now has like five kids. Between two sons from different fathers, a daughter from her new husband, and two step-kids, it can honestly be really hard to keep track of the Teen Mom girl's family. And TBH, she's not the only MTV star with difficult-to-follow family lines. In fact, most of the Teen Mom girls have kids with more than one father. So to help keep things straight, we got to work on these handy family trees. Check out our handy lineage charts to track how many kids each mom has, and who they're with.

How big are reality star salaries? Jason Tartick breaks it down with Us Weekly editors.
title: Jenelle Evans Kids: See Her and the Rest of the Teen Mom Family Trees
